doc:
David Aaron Baker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Aaron_Baker 0 David Aaron Baker (born August 14, 1963) is an American actor whose credits stretch across theater, film, and television.On Broadway, he is most prominently known for his starring role as "Prince Dauntless" opposite Sarah Jessica Parker in the 1999 Tony Award nominated revival of Once Upon A Mattress. He subsequently appeared in the 2004 revival of Lorraine Hansberry's A Raisin in the Sun, opposite Phylicia Rashad, Audra McDonald, Sanaa Lathan, and Sean Combs.On film, he has appeared in Woody Allen’s Melinda and Melinda. He is the voice of Dean Koontz's Odd Thomas on audio book. David_Aaron_Baker ( born August_14 , 1963 ) is an_American_actor whose_credits stretch across theater , film , and television.On_Broadway , he is_most_prominently_known for his_starring_role as "_Prince_Dauntless " opposite_Sarah_Jessica_Parker in the_1999_Tony_Award nominated revival of Once Upon A_Mattress . He subsequently appeared in the_2004_revival of Lorraine_Hansberry 's_A_Raisin in the_Sun , opposite_Phylicia_Rashad , Audra_McDonald , Sanaa_Lathan , and Sean_Combs.On_film , he has_appeared in Woody_Allen ’s_Melinda_and_Melinda . He is the_voice of Dean_Koontz 's_Odd_Thomas on audio_book .
